domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: CNN Newsroom
entity.description: "CNN Newsroom" presents the day's headlines and breaking stories live from CNN headquarters in Atlanta. The rotating cast of anchors and contributors includes Carol Costello, Kyra Phillips, Suzanne Malveaux, Brooke Baldwin, Don Lemon, Randi Kaye and Fredricka Whitfield.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The Lead With Jake Tapper
entity.description: CNN's chief Washington correspondent, Jake Tapper, hosts this hourlong weekday afternoon program, which covers all the day's top stories from around the country and the world, headlines that span politics, money, sports and popular culture. "The Lead" works to ensure that viewers are caught up on the stories that matter, often highlighting news that may have been overlooked. Prior to joining CNN, Tapper served as senior White House correspondent at ABC News.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Death Row Stories
entity.description: CNN is by and large still a cable news outlet, but a movement under the leadership of network president Jeff Zucker to provide more alternative, entertainment-based programming is clearly afoot, and "Death Row Stories" is a prime example. The documentary -- the result of a collaboration with Academy Award-winning directors Robert Redford ("Ordinary People") and Alex Gibney ("Taxi to the Dark Side") -- revisits compelling capital murder cases in the U.S., detailing the twists and turns involved in each as a thought-provoking exercise on the death penalty and the American justice system. Redford's Sundance Productions also partnered with CNN for the documentary series "Chicagoland."

domain.name: TV Shows

entity.name: CNN Newsroom with Brooke Baldwin
entity.description: Brooke Baldwin anchors this weekday afternoon edition of "CNN Newsroom" from the network's New York bureau. The program, featuring CNN correspondents, analysts and guests, brings viewers live coverage of the latest news, current events, and headlines from around the world.
